tags: Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Akshay for my sister‚Äôs treatment when she was suffering from Dengue. Dr. Akshay was extremely helpful, patient and comforting in this troubled situation for us. He explained the issue very well and suggested remedies which could be undertaken in the comfort of one‚Äôs home. He emphasised on the importance of diet and liquid intake which helped my sister ultimately recover from her sickness. I also visited Dr. Jeevan Jain (Dr. Akshay‚Äôs father) for this purpose and I‚Äôm extremely happy with both the doctors especially with their friendly attitude towards their patients.

tags: None
review: I visited Dr. Jain for a severe throat infection and high fever. He was very kind and accommodating. After booking an appointment through practo, he personally called to make sure I'm aware of the clinic location and even sent directions for my benefit. On visiting, he explained the symptoms and the disease in detail which greatly eased my discomfort. He explained the cause and even the medication in great detail and was very helpful with any questions I had. He has been very friendly and welcoming as well as patient with me. He was also available after hours when I had an emergency, which was truly a blessing. He is caring towards his patients and has a remarkable personal touch. It already feels like I have been his patient for years and not merely days. Thank you Dr Akshay Jain for such a wonderful treatment. God Bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After moving to Mumbai, I have been visiting Dr. Akshay from past 2 years. Ist thing that sets him apart is he listens to his patients. He stays updated about current disease in city.His diagnosis and writing proper medication has helped me and my husband get well. Thank you Practo, I found the doctor here.Thank you Dr. Akshay. May you keep healing people and helping them in pain. Best wishes.

tags: None
review: ** ** * **** **** ****** **** ********* ************** Being Deaf & Mute and suffering from sore throat,  mild fever and headache,  he checked up and prescribed pills with precautions like avoid cold drinks,  etc. I got well in two days. Strongly recommended for him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ****** *** *** ***** **** * ******* ************* *** ******** Suggested home remedies and hung up. We called him back to understand the medication, ** ******* **** ** ** **** * ***** to ask what medication he‚Äôs prescribing and how it would soothe the symptoms. 

He didn‚Äôt even bother sending a prescription, wrote a list of medication in a message. When we asked him for a prescription, he sent his staff‚Äôs number and asked us to call them since he was busy with an emergency. 

I understand emergencies can be uncertain and need to be prioritised but at least have the professional courtesy to let us know and postpone the appointment instead of talking for 5 minutes and not even bothering with a proper prescription. ****** *** **** ******* ********* ****** **** **** *** ************* ********* * ******** I would highly suggest against consulting with him. ** *** ** * **** ****** *** *** * ************ ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: thanks a lot De. Akshay Jain you helped me feel better after taking your prescribed medication I am able to relive a acidity free life. thanks for advice for full health checkup look up to you for any health issue. your medicines worked magic for me. thanks again.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I didn't have a good experience with doctors especially in hospitals in Mumbai. So when I got sick this time, I decided to go to Dr.Jain and not some hospital. He was so patient, listened to all the symptoms before advising on anything. He recommended only the essential tests and meds, and required only the minimal visits. He also used vitamins for fast recovery during and post my diagnosis, which I have not seen many doctors doing.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Akshay is a patient and attentive listener, so I was assured that my problem is completely understood. He also broke things down for me and explained the course of action instead of just prescribing medicines. He completely invested in making me better and following his treatment and advise religiously really got me back on my feet sooner than I expected. I highly recommend his expertise.

tags: None
review: Dr. Akshay is the most humble person and a very good listener . As i enter the clinic, the front board says, we don't just cure, we CARE ! And this is exactly what you will l experience when u meet him !! He is easily approachable and very patient to hear all your problems! Highly recommended!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Jain took the time to explain that my foot pain may be caused by different factors, he went through them all and discussed various tests I could take to eliminate them being the cause.

He took the time to call me once the tests were through and spent time explaining the reports and what treatment I should take.

Dr Jain is a very caring, patient Dr with a great bedside manner. 

Would I go back to see Dr Hain - absolutely 
Would I recommend him - yes absolutely

review: More than the treatment it is important for a patient to understand the root cause behind the ailment. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Jain was punctual and handled me with care and patience. He explained my signs and symptoms in detail, aptly responded to my questions and prescribed medicines. I started feeling much better about an hour after I started the medicines he prescribed. His clinic is also well-equipped, and he also carries out blood tests during diagnosis if necessary. Reports were on time, and so was my prognosis.

The receptionist is sweet and thoughtful too. 

PS: The doctor could not keep up his promise to call me but was available to take my calls both the time.

tags: None
review: Dr. Akshay made me feel at ease and patiently heard me out. It felt like he genuinely cared. The treatment he prescribed worked for me very well.  JutsHealth also took extra pains to make sure I could pay by card instead of cash.  Will definitely recommend Dr. Akshay and Just Health to others.
